```{r}
library(flexdashboard)

summaryTableForVocabularyAndDatabase <- params$summaryTableForVocabularyAndDatabase
targetVocabularyId <- params$targetVocabularyId
databaseName <- params$databaseName

# Update title dynamically
if(!is.null(targetVocabularyId) && !is.null(databaseName)) {
  title <- paste0("Coverage of ", targetVocabularyId, " in ", databaseName)
  htmltools::tags$script(paste0("document.title = '", title, "';"))
}

```
